divs: sighting detailsi was driving west on riverside drive in toluca lake\north hollywood. i saw something flashing above me at a stoplight. about 30 stories high moving slowly toward hollywood over the hill. at first i thought it had something to do with christmas because it looked like a fan made of giant white christmas wreaths flashing in a pattern across the fan. there was onw flashing blue or white light that looked normal like on a helecoptet or plane. i followed it as it slowly moved toward hollywood. i didn't hear any loud sound when i stuck my head out the window. it wasn't flying weird or anything bit i don't know how anything we have could be shaped like that and fly. it was probably about four cars side by side wide...not sure... after i lost sight of it a police helicopter came flying around the sky with its searchlight on. did anyone else see this?? i'm really freaked out!
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around December 16th 2010
